299440.「地獄の門の封印が 解けている！？\n まだ しばらく 保つはずだったのに……！:
The seal on the Gate of Hell has been broken!
It was supposed to hold for a while!

299443.「すみません セツラン君。\n まさか こんなに早く 封印が解けるとは……。:
I'm sorry, Mr. Setsuran. I didn't expect the
seal to be lifted so soon.

299445.「……手助けなんか 必要ありません！\n オレひとりで じゅうぶんです！:
I don't need any help! I'm good enough on my
own!

299447.「まだだ……まだ やれる！\n オレは 戦士とパラディンを極めし者……\n ガー:
Not yet... not yet! I am a warrior, a master
paladin, a guardian!

299448.「ダメです セツラン君！\n 君は じゅうぶん 戦った。\n ここは 僕たちに任:
No, Mr. Setsuran! You've fought plenty. We'll
take care of this!

299449.「行けますね <cs_pchero>君？\n 手分けして 片付けましょう！:
Can we go <cs_pchero>? Let's split up and
clean up!

299452.「いいえ……地獄の門を 再封印しないかぎり\n 魔物は 永遠に 生まれつづけます:
No... unless the Gate of Hell is resealed,
monsters will continue to be born forever.

299453.「キリカ修道会の僧侶が作る 聖具。\n これを使えば……！:
A sacrament made by the priests of the Kirika
Monastery. With this...!

299454.「魔封のじゅずよ！\n 邪悪なる来訪者が残せし 呪いの門を\n 今ひとたび 封じ:
Sealing Beads! Seal once more the gates of the
curse left behind by the evil visitor!

299455.「……これで もう 大丈夫です。\n セツラン君 <cs_pchero>君\n:
...Now you're all set. Setsuran, <cs_pchero>
you did a great job!

299456.「いいえ オレは……ガーディアン失格です。\n 団長たちが 来てくれなかったら\:
No, I'm... a failed guardian. If the Commander
and his men hadn't come, we would have been in
deep trouble...!

299457.「……たしかに 君は 真っ先に\n 門の封印が解けたと 報せにくるべきでした。\:
Indeed, you should have been the first to
report that the gate was unsealed. Why did you
take the risk of fighting alone?

299458.「オレは……選ばれた者しか なれないっていう\n ガーディアンを目指して 死ぬほ:
I worked myself to death to become a Guardian, which they say only the chosen one can become, and I was so happy to finally realize my
dream.

299459.「でも オレの ちょっと後に入ってきた\n <cs_pchero>が すごいヤツ:
But <cs_pchero>, who came in a little after
me, was an amazing guy...so I was in a big
hurry.

299460.「地獄の門が 予定より早く開いて 驚いたけど\n 手柄を立てる チャンスだとも思:
I was surprised when the Gate of Hell opened earlier than expected, but I also saw it as a chance to take credit... so I decided to fight
it alone.

299461.「それは 正しくない判断だったと\n 君は もう 気付いていますね？:
You already know it was the wrong decision,
don't you?

299462.「はい！ だって 手柄とか そんなもの……\n ガーディアンには 必要ありません:
Yes, sir! Because, you know, we don't need any
credit or any of that... guardian stuff!

299463.「ガーディアンの本分は 守ること。\n 功を競うことばかり考えていた オレが\n:
A Guardian's duty is to protect. All I did was
think about competing with others, and I was
wrong... all wrong...!

299464.「オレを守りながら戦う 団長と <cs_pchero>の\n 背中を見て ようや:
A person who finally realizes this when he sees the backs of the Commander and fighting while protecting
me...has no Guardian Qualification.

299465.「……若い時の過ちは 誰にでもあるものです。\n 君は 自分の過ちに 自分で気が:
...We all make mistakes when we are young.
You've realized your own mistakes. Then
there's only one thing I can say.

299468.「君たちは 僕と守護騎士団にとって\n 等しく必要で かけがえのない仲間です。\:
You are equally necessary and irreplaceable
companions for me and my Guardians. Please
continue to lend me your support.

299471.「さあ……本部で 君の手当てをしなければ。\n 歩けますか セツラン君？:
Come on... we'll have to patch you up at
headquarters. Can you walk, Mr. Setsuran?

299472.「はい 大丈夫です。\n オレも ガーディアンですから！: Yes, it's okay. I'm a Guardian too!

299473.「<cs_pchero>君。渡したいものがあるので\n 君も 本部に来てください:
<cs_pchero>. I have something to give you,
and you should come to headquarters too.
